definitions: The action of dividing or breaking into two or more parts.
The action of causing something to divide or break into parts.
The action of ending a relationship or association.
The action of distributing or sharing something among several people or groups.
examples: The splitting of the atom released immense energy.
The splitting of the company into two divisions improved efficiency.
Their constant arguing led to the splitting of the band.
The splitting of the profits was fair among all partners.
